page.title: 06OLD UPWOOD SCHOOL
page.content: {Upwood school}was first started in about 1900.It had two rooms.Both of them made a lot of noise when you entered because the floors were made of wood and the ceiling was a long way up.The{infant department}was taught by Mrs. Denny and Mrs. Emmanuel,{Mr.Denny {being the headmaster}taught in the junior room.There were about thirty to forty pupils in each room.The playground was a small area with four outdoor toilets ,two for boys and two for the girls.Games played were skipping and hopscotch and the boys grew mushrooms.The school was never decorated and the smoke from the two stoves almost blocked the view completely.People took it in turns to ring the bell.Mr.Denny liked music lessons. by Tom and Peter
